p: German Chamomile ( Matricaria chamomilla), a member of Asteraceae family is enriched with blue oil and flavonoids. It has been reported that flowers extract of German chamomile is more effective to kill hand microbes, compared with the commercial hand sanitizer ( Singh et al., 2011). Extract from chamomile flowers contain 0.4 to 2% of essential oil with active antimicrobial properties; in addition, flower extract contain more than 120 chemical compounds identified as secondary metabolites, including 36 flavonoids and 28 terpenoids, α-bisabolol, cyclic ethers, chamazulene, flavonoids and umbelliferone etc. α-bisabolol and chamazulene exhibit antiseptic properties ( Saad et al., 2011).
